title: Sea Otter 2024 New Suspension Mega Roundup
content:
There were a LOT of new suspension components at Sea Otter this year, so we decided to round them up into their own video. From new inverted forks, to new frames, and even a few famous faces, this video has a bit of everything. Check it out!

The post Sea Otter 2024 New Suspension Mega Roundup appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Greg Lawrence
